hints: {max2} begins with the highest expected reward.
Initially, the reward are ranked by {min2}, {min1}, {mid}, {max1}, {max2}
{min2} starts with the lowest expected rewards.
{min1} and {min2} begin as the lowest performers.
{max1} and {max2} begin as the top performers.
Count your pulls and anticipate major arm value changes after 10 trials.
When rewards suddenly drop, quickly test all arms to find which ones still perform well.
Identify which arms maintain consistent performance across reset events.
Develop separate strategies for before and after reset events.
Always maintain some exploration to quickly adapt after the arm values reset.
